text.description: We have noticed a network device throwing unusual errors. We are investigating.
text.title: Incident #1

events.description: We have temporarily mitigated traffic. Users might experience slow performance, but sites should load.
events.title: Monitoring

events.description: We are currently monitoring our platform to determine the success of the mitigation. We will provide another update at 18:50 UTC.
events.title: Monitoring

events.description: Unfortunately, we need to temporarily restart our systems. We will restart them one at a time, but during the mitigation, our website will be unavailable.
events.title: Update

events.description: After the restart, we are now seeing performance return back to normal levels. We will update in case anything turns out to be unsuccessful or need more attention.
events.title: Resolved
